snippet: Senator Charles E. Schumer keeps close track of office romances and is known to cajole, nag and outright pester his staff toward connubial bliss.
abstract: Sen Charles E Schumer keeps close track of office romances and is known to cajole, nag and outright pester his staff toward marriages; there have been 10 weddings so far among members of his staff, and two more are scheduled for this fall.
lead_paragraph: Senator Charles E. Schumer keeps close track of office romances and is known to cajole, nag and outright pester his staff toward connubial bliss.

headline.seo: With a Full Quiver, Senator Schumer Is Quick to Release Cupid’s Arrows
headline.main: Senator, Senator, Make Me a Match: For Staff, Schumer Is Cupid
headline.print_headline: Senator, Senator, Make Me a Match: For Staff, Schumer Is Cupid
